description.@en: Emblazoned upon your shield is the symbol of a golden sun. When this holiest of symbols of the Steward is held aloft it serves as both a signal to those who’d dare trespass against you and a means to gird against incoming missile fire.

effect.@en: When you suffer Damage from a ranged weapon, roll a 1D6 Chaos Die. If it lands on face ‘6’, you ignore the Damage as you automatically Parry the missile for 0 AP. Otherwise, you can attempt to Parry as usual. You must be armed with a shield in order to use this Trait.
